_field_real.name: shake duration:seconds#the effect will last for this duration.
random translation:world units#random translation in all directions

_field_angle.name: random rotation:degrees#random rotation in all directions

_field_real_fraction.name: wobble weight#a value of 0.0 signifies that the wobble function has no effect; a value of 1.0 the wobble function completely scales the translational and rotational magnitudes. The less the weight, the less the effect wobble has.

_field_short_enum.name: wobble function#a function to perturb the effect's behavior over time

_field_real.name: zoom penalty linear #multiplier penalty that increases linearly with zoom over 1
zoom penalty squareroot #multiplier penalty that increases with square root of zoom over 1
